mapper.select: SELECT * FROM games WHERE DATE_FORMAT(game_date, '%Y-%m') = #{yearMonth} ORDER BY game_date ASC, game_time ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO games ( game_date, game_time, home_team_code, away_team_code, stadium_id, score_home, score_away, status, etc_info, created_at ) VALUES ( #{gameDate}, #{gameTime}, #{homeTeamCode}, #{awayTeamCode}, #{stadiumId}, IFNULL(#{scoreHome},0), IFNULL(#{scoreAway},0), #{status}, #{etcInfo}, NOW() )
mapper.update: UPDATE games SET game_date = #{gameDate}, game_time = #{gameTime}, home_team_code = #{homeTeamCode}, away_team_code = #{awayTeamCode}, stadium_id = #{stadiumId}, score_home = #{scoreHome}, score_away = #{scoreAway}, status = #{status}, etc_info = #{etcInfo}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE game_id = #{gameId}
